name: Silent Space (itch)
description:
My debut game and entry for the RPGMZ "Touch the stars" game jam


Game description:

Play as Sparrow, a freshly-graduated space engineer. Put all your engineering skills to the test, by repairing damaged spacecrafts for your corporate overlords at Hartmann Inc.
Join a team of highly professional veteran engineers and rise to the very top!

"Warning - high difficulty". -Well, it is literally rocket science...

Additional features include:

Loot your way trough the TSS Pacifica.
Hack computers and mechanical devices.
Solve engaging engineering problems.
Craft wondrous devices and useful items.
Pilot exotic machinery.
Enjoy the relaxing background humming of spacecrafts and take in futuristic sceneries.

And always remember:
In space, nobody can hear you.....
-repair mass fusion reactors.

Disclaimer: Screenshots/Trailer/Descriptions may or may not be representative of the final game :)

Some additional info just to be safe:

After the prologue you will see the Silent Space - Code Pacifica screen and a scene that could be confused with the game restarting. But it isn't. The game actually really starts at this point, so don't close the game :D
